Title: Relates to the submission of certain reports by licensed home care services agencies
Summary: Provides that the department of health shall make available to licensed home care services agencies all platforms, applications, software, forms and other documents necessary for the licensed home care services agency to submit statistical reports associated with required registration materials.
LawCode: Amd ยง3605-b, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to the submission of certain reports by licensed home care services agencies
